it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class WeaponWithMultipleEffects

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.weapons.Weapon
      • it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.weapons.WeaponWithMultipleEffects

  • public class WeaponWithMultipleEffects
extends Weapon
    This class inherits from the basic weapon and it also offers powered attacks that can be used together with the basic attack

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean mustExecuteInOrder
      This property states whether the attacks can be used in any order or not
      private java.util.Map<Attack,java.util.List<Coin>> poweredAttacks
      This property maps each powered attack to its cost

      This constructor assignes all the final values to the weapon, making it ready to be bought

    • Constructor Detail

      • WeaponWithMultipleEffects

        public WeaponWithMultipleEffects(Attack basicAttack,
                                 java.util.Map<Attack,java.util.List<Coin>> poweredAttacks,
                                 java.lang.String name,
                                 java.util.List<Coin> reloadCost,
                                 java.util.List<Coin> acquisitionCost,
                                 boolean mustExecuteInOrder)
        This constructor assignes all the final values to the weapon, making it ready to be bought
        Parameters:
        basicAttack - the basic attack of the weapon
        poweredAttacks - a non-empty map of the powered attacks of the weapon with their relative cost
        name - a string with the name of the weapon
        reloadCost - a list of coin equal to the reload cost of the weapon
        acquisitionCost - a list of coin equal to the acquisition cost of the weapon
        mustExecuteInOrder - true if the effects can only be used in the given order and with basic effect first

    • Method Detail

      • getPoweredAttacks

        public java.util.List<Attack> getPoweredAttacks()
        This method gets a list with all the possible powered attack of the weapon
        Returns:
        a list with the powered attacks of the weapon

      • getAttackCost

        public java.util.List<Coin> getAttackCost(Attack attack)
        This method gets the cost of the given attack
        Parameters:
        attack - the attack you want to know the cost of
        Returns:
        the cost of the given attack, null if the weapon does not include it

      • mustExecuteInOrder

        public boolean mustExecuteInOrder()
        This method tells whether the powered attacks and the basic attack can be used in any order
        Returns:
        true if there is a fixed order for the attacks, otherwise false
